__e: IT'S LIKELY TO BE VERY BORING. BUT IT'S CERTAINLY NOT WEIRD.
Hey, I know this place can wear on you, but if you need to talk I'm around.
I know it's a boring job... but it's better than that last shit they had me doing. I spent two years in the kitchen scrubbing hot-ass pots and pans.
I thought my case was too boring for you.
I'm sure no sex is boring to your husband. Or anyone's husband. Or boyfriend.
Well, I hope this isn't too boring for you. Are you kidding?
Because the boring someone I already am.. wasn't good enough for you.
Either this is the most boring dream I've ever had or you can't sleep either.
But spending day after day in this place, must be pretty boring What do you do every day?
And I always thought you were dull as dirt.
And if it's as dull asou say it is,I'm sure-- no,no,no,no,no.
Anyway, I hope tomorrow isn't as boring as today.
Yes, I agree. Except he's so boring. What about Max?
Everything that happens to me is dull and stupid.
Really, he's very boring, and so not my type.
I said it was boring. I didn't say it was wrong.
The cleverest thing to tell you would be that you were fascinating, right?
I really don't think we match, and you're quite annoying, so I don't want to see you anymore. Please don't call back.
